text: Dr. Christopher Khng provided exceptional treatment for my cataract. I am thrilled to be able to read without glasses now. He is highly professional and always responds to my questions clearly and in a way that’s easy to understand. I highly recommend Eyewise Vision for anyone considering eye surgery.

I have been seeing Dr Christopher Khng for the last 3-4 years. He performed cataract surgery for me. He is careful and skillful, and explains my condition clearly.
Besides, he always patiently answered all the questions.

Visited Dr Khng with ongoing dry eye issues. Consultation was thorough and very clear. Eyes have improved considerably since then and great to have a Dr that promotes natural preservative free eye drops.
Doctor and staff are nice and provide excellent services to us. Im happy with the vision after the cataract surgery.

I have been under Dr. Christopher Khng’s care for 4 years now and highly recommend him to anyone in need of eye care. The doctor always explain the tests results in details and answer all questions I had, providing necessary advise. Also, the staff are very friendly and welcoming, and always made me feel comfortable throughout my visit.
